session_info.name: MOXAB1 - Plenary Invited Oral Presentation (Applications of Accelerators)

papers.title: ADS Programme and Key Technology R&D in China
authors: Along with the rapid development of nuclear power plants in China

treatment of the nuclear waste has become a crucial issue. The roadmap of the nuclear transmutation with accelerator driven subcritical system (ADS) towards its demo in 2032 is set up in China. This presentation should first review world-wide ADS development
and then focus on the Chinese ADS program
